name: Mojito
ingredients: Soda water/Lemon based soda to taste (150ml recommended)
1/3 shot glass of fruit pur√©e of choice
instructions: Add mint leaves and sugar to a highball glass.
Muddle gently to release mint oils, being careful not to tear the leaves.
Add lime juice and stir to dissolve sugar.
Top with soda water and stir gently.
Garnish with a lime wedge and mint sprig.
